title: Allow users to change f/t magnitude in-GUI, without use of dialog

content.raw:
This might be especially beneficial for novices who do not have any specific values in mind and just want to play around. Using the dialog puts more cognitive load on the user.

More brainstorming needed, but here are some ideas:

* When the f/t marker is selected, scrolling the scroll wheel could increase and decrease the arrow size. This would conflict with the zooming feature, but it may be okay since the overlap would only occur when the arrow is selected. 

* We could also make the Scale markers appear if the user selects a f/t marker (maybe if they click into it twice?). Manipulating the scale markers increases/decreases f/t arrow size and magnitude.

* If we do this, we'd need to add a hot key for applying the f/t (space bar, Enter?)
